publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1818 Donald Gorrie: The Scottish Women’s Hospital at Royaumont—That the Parliament applauds the commemoration, as part of the centenary celebrations of the Entente Cordiale, of the Scottish Women’s Hospital at Royaumont which cared for wounded French soldiers from 1915 to 1919, while also remembering the Scottish Women’s Hospitals in Serbia, Russia, Romania and Greece.
S2M-1818 The Scottish Women’s Hospital at Royaumont (lodged on 1 October 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1818 The Scottish Women’s Hospital at Royaumont (lodged on 1 October 2004) Ms Wendy Alexander*
